TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content: Yep, all done, don't forget it changes your login too.
i was just wondering how to deleate this account? as i used the wrong username and you cant change that.

You can use this thread to change your name if you want. 

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/110713-the-name-change-thread-warning-one-time-only/](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/110713-the-name-change-thread-warning-one-time-only/)

> 
> 
> 2 minutes ago, Arknid sine said:
> 
> 
> i was just wondering how to deleate this account? as i used the wrong username and you cant change that.
> 

You can never leave... you're going to stay with us... forever...

Merged into the existing thread for this sort of thing. 

What name do you want to use, The Poster Formerly Known as Arknid sine?

May I get name changed to "Fires" Someone currently has that name taken but their [profile](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/108064-fires/) seems to be AFK and they never get on.

If not, "FiresThatBurn" old steam name that I had, it works. Fires is prefered but if you cant get it it's alright ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

> If not, "FiresThatBurn" old steam name that I had, it works. Fires is prefered but if you cant get it it's alright ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Name changed to "FiresThatBurn". I won't be deleting any user's account, even if they never log on.
Please change my name to "SiliconPyro".

>

Changed.
Can you please change my user name to the correct spelling of Nurse Ratched.

Could my name be changed to "Snikersnee" (With a capital s and without the c) I've changed my steam to it and I'd like this account to be it too.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-02-27T23:49:44Z" title="02/27/2016 11:49  PM" data-short="8 yr">February 27, 2016</time> by Play\_LORD**

[@Nurse Ratched](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/112512-nurse-ratched/), changed and merged with your alt, NurseRached, one account per member please, it's in the rules.

[@Play_LORD](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/145105-play_lord/), changed to [@Snikersnee](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/145105-snikersnee/)

Remember to use the new name to log in.
Thanks a ton.

could I be "Lupi" perhaps?

"aWildLupiDragon" is a biiiiit clunky.
Okay aWildLupiDragon, you're just Lupi now ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
I'd like to change my username to "Generic", please.

Hi [@Generic_Username](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/160375-generic_username/), sure one moment, also this changes your login so use Generic next time ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
Thanks [@sal_vager](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/16426-sal_vager/)

I am completely with the idea, but shouldn't people have thought about it before choosing a username? I went through several ideas for a name, such as Kerbaman, but this was the best, since I share it with KSP Bro KS.

          -KSP Bro AE

> 
> 
> 1 minute ago, KSP Bros said:
> 
> 
> I am completely with the idea, but shouldn't people have thought about it before choosing a username? I went through several ideas for a name, such as Kerbaman, but this was the best, since I share it with KSP Bro KS.
> 
> 
> 
> 
>           -KSP Bro AE
> 

Sometimes people don't foresee any confusion/bad things that come with the username.  For example, I originally didn't have the M capitalized in my username, so people kept calling me Clifnom and other things like that.
Please use this thread for name-change requests. We don't want any to get overlooked in general chatting.
I'd like to change my name to NeoFatalis ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
Can I still change my name ? I would like to use "Rime Pendragon" instead of rhaak.

I'd like to request my username be changed to "Anquietas" (without the quotes).

> 
> 
> On 3/15/2016 at 0:21 AM, KSP Bro AE said:
> 
> 
> I am completely with the idea, but shouldn't people have thought about it before choosing a username?
> 

In my case my current username (armagheddonsgw for posterity) is one I made something like 10-15 years ago, The misspelling was deliberate (correct spelling already taken on whatever the original thing was) but eventually I got sick of being called on it and changed it to Anquietas a few years back (2013 I think).
